amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 118-142 to strike $300 million of Ukraine funding.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the bill's authorization of $300 million of Ukraine funding and the extension of land-lease authority for the country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 341 (Roll no. 303).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Greene (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 341 (Roll no. 303).
